mapper.insert: insert into tbl_item (item_id, category, item_name, item_price, description) values(seq_item.nextval,#{category},#{item_name},#{item_price},#{description})
mapper.update: update tbl_item set category=#{category}, item_name=#{item_name}, item_price=#{item_price},description=#{description} where item_id=#{item_id}
mapper.select: select item_price from tbl_item where item_id=#{item_id}
